rows.label: qst710701_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh! Who will buy fine vase!
Very lovely ceramic thing!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0003
rows.name: Mo... No-one will buy vase of Momimi.

rows.label: qst710701_msg0004
rows.name:
Ngh... Momimi cannot
sell vase. This is sad.

rows.label: qst710701_msg0005
rows.name:
Mo mo! Perhaps friends can stop
for moment and lend ear to
terrible problem of Momimi!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0006
rows.name:
Maybe surprising to friends,
but Momimi actually merchant
of Pyrithium Trade Guild.

rows.label: qst710701_msg0007
rows.name:
Momimi get big-time request to
borrow a million G of money of
Momimi! Big opportunity for profit!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0008
rows.name:
Money of pocket of Momimi
only 900,000G right now.
Difficult position...

rows.label: qst710701_msg0009
rows.name:
Even though Momimi is up-and-coming
merchant with big hunger for success,
still bit of a scatterbrain.

rows.label: qst710701_msg0010
rows.name:
So Momimi exactly 100,000G short.
Trying with skills and resources as
merchant to raise shortfall now.

rows.label: qst710701_msg0011
rows.name:
Momimi lug ceramic ware all the way
from guild and shout in big voice to
draw customers... But results are sad.

rows.label: qst710701_msg0012
rows.name:
Vase of Momimi not bought
by Iiran people. Mo...

rows.label: qst710701_msg0013
rows.name:
This big surprise, because vase
increase popularity and luck
100,000 time from day of purchase!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0014
rows.name:
Mo? You think customers scared
of such mysterious vase? Afraid
of vase's mystical forces?

rows.label: qst710701_msg0015
rows.name:
Momimi not care. Just need
somehow to get 100,000G, or
be gobbled up bitey-smitey!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0016
rows.name: Mo! Momimi just find idea in head!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0017
rows.name:
If friends have nice expensive items
that people like to buy...friends can
let Momimi have items! Genius!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0018
rows.name:
With good ceramics, Momimi can use
excellence in selling to sell lots.
Behold, brilliance of unique plan of Momimi!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0019
rows.name:
But, mo... Sell one at time take too
much time... Time is short supplied.
If only vases were made of time.

rows.label: qst710701_msg0020
rows.name:
Mo! Head of Momimi yet again
produces great idea! Use this!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0021
rows.name:
Tadaa! Brand-new nopto-currency
of Momimi: Momimimoney!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0022
rows.name:
Mo... Is almost like
toy money... Uhm...

rows.label: qst710701_msg0023
rows.name:
No! Momimimoney sure to catch on!
And to save on O's and I's, can
also call MMMM, like yummy treat.

rows.label: qst710701_msg0024
rows.name:
According to reckoning of
Momimi, would like to set
starting value of 1MMMM at 200G.

rows.label: qst710701_msg0025
rows.name:
That mean once friends bring in
100,000 real money value, which
equal 500MMMM, can sell off in bulk!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0026
rows.name:
Not to worry! Momimi famous
even in guild for uncanny
knack of valuation!

rows.label: qst710701_msg0027
rows.name:
Is all understood, yes? Wishing friends
to be bringer of good fortune!
